titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Margaret Braithwaite, [1930er ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Aus einer Kopie in 'The Rush Rhees Archive' in Swansea. Signatur: SU/PC/1/71
Abschrift und Kommentar Gabriel Citron und Brian McGuinness, Scan in BA.

div.p: Thanks for your note. I wondered why you weren’t turning up. – I needn’t say that I understand the reason perfectly & that I’m not angry. What I hope is that, whatever you do instead of coming to my classes, you will do with as much seriousness, decency & honesty as I think you had when you tried to do Philosophy.
should very much like to see you again before very long.
